articles.author: Ellen Nakashima
articles.title: NSA found a dangerous Microsoft software flaw and alerted the firm — rather than weaponize it - The Washington Post
articles.description: NSA found a dangerous Microsoft software flaw and alerted the firm — rather than weaponize it The Washington Post 5 popular Windows 10 settings tweaks you need to quit using ZDNet Microsoft bids farewell to Windows 7 and the millions of PCs that still run it …
articles.content:
Microsoft plans to issue a patch for the flaw on Tuesday, the individuals said.
Big kudos to NSA for voluntarily disclosing to Microsoft, said computer security expert Dmitri Alperovitch in a tweet Tuesday morning. This is the type of [vulnerability] I am su… [+2417 chars]
